name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Bible Time - Pop Into God's Word Busy Person

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Busy? Need God's Word? Pop into Chrome Bible Time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Need God? Need Bible Time? Jump Right into His Word with this extension. Just click the icon and wham, you are in!
